extracted_playbook.title: Check Sophos Firewall Version
extracted_playbook.description: Verify the installed version of Sophos Firewall to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Sophos Firewall version affected?
Is 'Allow automatic installation of hotfixes' enabled?

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Automatic Hotfix Installation
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the automatic installation of hotfixes is enabled, which is the default setting, to receive the necessary updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Manually Install Hotfixes
extracted_playbook.description: Manually install the appropriate hotfixes for the affected Sophos Firewall versions if automatic installation is not enabled.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Sophos Firewall Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest version of Sophos Firewall to ensure all security patches and protections are applied.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to User Portal and Webadmin
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the User Portal and Webadmin are not exposed to the Internet to protect against external attackers.
